Testimonials

Client Testimonials: Feedback on our design, dev, and strategy

Real experiences shared by our valued clients

Provides superior expertise and active communication and above and beyond results. Highly recommend!

Joseph Monahan, Senior Strategist @ Code3

Gary did incredible work on our new website! Our new site only launched a couple weeks ago and we have already seen higher traffic and conversion of leads. We highly recommend Loopdash!

Mandy Singh, Founder @ Perfect Fit Health Club

It's been great having a dedicated team host, maintain, and develop the website for my business. Rates are reasonable and service has been great the rare times I've needed it.

Doug Ott, Founder @ Andvari Associates

Gary and his team were great to work with and delivered above expectations

Aaron Perkins, Lead Developer @ oBuilds

I run a software consulting firm that does not staff designers. We have pulled Loopdash into multiple projects that requires graphic design, and our customers are always impressed with their work.

Kurtis Jensen, Founder @ oBuilds

Gary is great to work with. He's super responsive and provides excellent work. We've been working with him for a few years, and have always had really positive experiences.

Andres Reyes-Capo, Vice President Of Technology @ Forge Health

Gary did a fantastic job with our website, was very prompt from start to finish. Helpful and made great suggestions to get the site we were looking for!

Brandon Olmi, Founder @ Peak Dry Ice Blasting

Gary cares about his clients and his work. He put in tremendous effort to finish a project on a tight timeline by our deadline. He has remained highly responsive as a support engineer, resolving our technical and training issues with great efficiency.

Ed Sussman, Founder @ White Hat Wiki

My team has been working with Loopdash for over two years now and he has been a tremendous partner. They created a software tool web application for us that continues to evolve and is a big asset to our offering. Loopdash has done great job of listening to our goals and needs, staying organized, being transparent, and ensuring he hits deadlines.

Sam Jennings, Founder @ Code3

It has been an absolute pleasure working with Loopdash. I trust them to tackle some of the hardest projects we've faced. They've always come through and we're eager to continue working with them.

Zach Praiss, Digital Director @ Accountable Tech

Top notch pros. From start to finish the experience was kind and professional. All communication was clear and collaborative. Couldn't have asked for a better team.

Greg Holcomb, Founder @ The Holcomb + Durkovic Group

Gary and his team at Loopdash have been great to work with -- great design, thoughtful strategy, and responsive service. Really recommend them and will work with them again.

Daniel Fee, Manager @ Vote Domb
